Iceland (country).

Mordor is not black, it's ashy-darkgray.

MoreDore.

Ein Hind Burg.

(is Hinden plural? Doesn't matter, it was.)

I create hundreds of thousands of hills and distribute them evenly, causing everyone to own multiple hills. With everyone owning plenty of hills, nobody attacks other hills, and the demand for weapons and other supplies goes down. This drives arms factories out of business, causing economic collapse in this militant hill-fighting world, and hill-owners lose their jobs. The economy collapses, driving all the hills into anarchy, and they all fight and destroy each other and their hills, leaving nothing but me and my hill.  

My hill.

I simply buy your hill.

My hill now.
Local regulation rules are changed. Your hill is nationalized and declared public property.

The headers for the server that your hill is located in get erased and so your hill becomes un retrievable.

I draw a hill on a piece of paper.

My paper hill.
Words are flowing out like endless rain into a paper Hill...
I take the hill by force with tanks. *My* hill.

*\*cracks knuckles and looks at his deck.  taps 4 white\**
